Name: Sergeant Hiss
Description: Sergeant Hiss is a valiant member of the WebtrES club, known for his striking orange boxy frame and the intriguing cat-themed buttons that adorn his console. With arms and legs built for combat, this soldier has seen many digital battles, always facing his adversaries with the tactical cunning of a serpent—which is fitting, given his screen proudly displays a snake, symbolizing his quick reflexes and strategic mindset. Despite his combat-ready appearance, Sergeant Hiss is a guardian at heart, protecting the cyber realm with fierce loyalty and an unshakeable sense of duty.
